narrative.title: Revised Narrative
paragraphs: The stuffies slip off the bed and creep into the hall. Behind them, an ominous purple glow starts underneath the big girl bed.
From the light, long, spidery legs reach into the room. The sight makes them freeze. They hurry back and get ready.
They check their things and stand close together. The glow grows and fades like breathing. The stuffies keep still and wait for what will come next.

vocabulary.definition: giving a feeling that something bad might happen.
examples: An ominous cloud rolled in over the park.
The hallway grew quiet in an ominous way.
The suitcase was underneath the bed.
A coin slipped underneath the sofa.
A small glow came from the nightlight.
The campfire’s glow warmed our hands.

vocabulary.definition: thin and long like a spider’s legs.
examples: Spidery cracks spread across the glass.
She drew spidery lines on the map.

events.text: The toys climb down quietly and leave the room.
A strange purple light begins below the bed.
Long, thin legs reach out from the light.
The story sends the group to the next section.

distractors: A bright yellow light begins below the bed.
Thick, short legs reach out from the light.
The story sends the group back to the hallway.
